mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCount FROM IPTerminals WHERE Dno > (SELECT MAX(Dno) FROM "IPTerminals")-200
SELECT COUNT(*) as onlineCount FROM IPTerminals WHERE Dno > (SELECT MAX(Dno) FROM "IPTerminals")-200 AND ZDZT = '在线'
SELECT COUNT(*) as explicitCount FROM IPTerminals WHERE Dno > (SELECT MAX(Dno) FROM "IPTerminals")-200 AND ZDZT != '未知'
